name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Salesforce select all function for FLS setup

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps Salesforce Admins to select all columns while setting up field level permissions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small plugin for salesforce admins. Plugins is activated on field level security edit page for profiles and add a select all checkbox in to column header of visible and readonly to check all visible or readonly checkboxes in one click
